TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit AccessCondition extends System.Object

Docs.summary: Represents a set of access conditions to be used for operations in the Azure DocumentDB database service.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the value of the condition in the Azure DocumentDB database service.
Docs.value: The value of the condition. For IfMatch and IfNotMatch, this is the ETag that has to be compared to.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the condition type in the Azure DocumentDB database service.
Docs.value: The condition type. Can be IfMatch or IfNoneMatch.
